item.title: [PI] ObjectManager [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:1, topic:407368”]private int[][] customObjects = {{}}; public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 3218, 3433, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(3044, 3044, 9790, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3049, 9786, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2541, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2542, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2543, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2544, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2545, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 3208, 3438, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2465, 3229, 3220, 0, 10); // FUNPK Portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2477, 3220, 3230, 0, 10); // EDGE Portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2466, 3218, 3216, 0, 10); // BANK Portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2367, 3219, 3216, 0, 10); // BANK Signpost c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2368, 3224, 3220, 0, 10); // ACCOUNT Signpost c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2469, 3098, 3499, 0, 10); // LUMBY Portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2468, 3198, 3811, 0, 10); // FUNPK Portal if(c.heightLevel == 0) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2492, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); } else { if(c.heightLevel == 2) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2469, 3205, 3209, 0, 10); // BANK Portal } else { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); } } }
That’s my method, it’s making all spawned objects go on HeightLevel 2. Any help.[/quote]
Try changing the “2” in spawning to “0”

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ObjectManager [PI]
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

private int[][] customObjects = {{}}; public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 3218, 3433, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(3044, 3044, 9790, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3049, 9786, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2541, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2542, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2543, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2544, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2545, 3886, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 3208, 3438, 2, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2465, 3229, 3220, 0, 10); // FUNPK Portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2477, 3220, 3230, 0, 10); // EDGE Portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2466, 3218, 3216, 0, 10); // BANK Portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2367, 3219, 3216, 0, 10); // BANK Signpost c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2368, 3224, 3220, 0, 10); // ACCOUNT Signpost c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2469, 3098, 3499, 0, 10); // LUMBY Portal c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2468, 3198, 3811, 0, 10); // FUNPK Portal if(c.heightLevel == 0) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2492, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); } else { if(c.heightLevel == 2) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2469, 3205, 3209, 0, 10); // BANK Portal } else { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); } } }
That’s my method, it’s making all spawned objects go on HeightLevel 2. Any help.

Read full topic
